snippet: As Washington and Havana announced plans to reopen embassies, Cubans pondered, with a mix of hope and skepticism, how the changes would affect their daily lives.
abstract: Cubans greet news America will re-establish full diplomatic ties with Cuba by cautiously celebrating, pondering if influx of American tourists and end of trade sanctions will revitalize economy and lead dictatorial government down democratic path.
lead_paragraph: As Washington and Havana announced plans to reopen embassies, Cubans pondered, with a mix of hope and skepticism, how the changes would affect their daily lives.

headline.main: Cubans Greet Latest Step in U.S. Thaw With Hope Tempered by Reality
headline.print_headline: Cubans Greet Latest Step in Thaw With Hope Tempered by Reality
